enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, invalidate all lines in way 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, push all modified lines in way 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, invalidate all lines in way 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, push all modified lines in way 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write: no effect. Read: no cache command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write: initiate command indicated by bits 27-24. Read: cache command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write: no effect. Read: no line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write: initiate line command indicated by bits 27-24. Read: line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write: no effect. Read: no line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write: initiate line command indicated by bits CLCR[27:24]. Read: line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, invalidate all lines in way 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, push all modified lines in way 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, invalidate all lines in way 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When setting the GO bit, push all modified lines in way 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write: no effect. Read: no cache command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write: initiate command indicated by bits 27-24. Read: cache command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write: no effect. Read: no line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write: initiate line command indicated by bits 27-24. Read: line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Write: no effect. Read: no line command active

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Write: initiate line command indicated by bits CLCR[27:24]. Read: line command active
